Improvements.Improvement: Avoid excessive use of if-else statements
Improvements.Description: The run() method uses an excessive number of if-else statements, causing the code to be hard to read and maintain. Refactoring this to a switch statement would make the code more readable.

Improvements.Improvement: Minimize the use of raw types
Improvements.Description: The LinkedList created on line 5 uses raw types. It would be better to specify the type of the elements in the LinkedList.
